page.title: 07THE BMX TRACK
page.content: The BMX track was built in 1983 in a field behind what is now the sports centre in the {West End of Clevedon}. A lot of children had had BMX bikes that year for Christmas or birthday presents. The {Comet}company started a club called the {Clevedon Comets } which costs Â£1 and you get a newsletter 4 times ,a membership card,transfers and stickers.There are about 40 people in the club but it should get bigger. On the track there are 4 speed jumps,6 berms,a table top,camels and a step down.There is going to be a quarter pipe and a trick ramp at the end of the year.The track is being extended t0 328 metres and 8 people can fit into the starting gate.Tyres are put round the outside for safety. They are starting freestyle competitions.
